long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for disneyplus.com users. Adds IMDb rating to Disney Plus Movies and Series.

Extension is open source. Check source code here: https://github.com/onikienko/disney-plus-ratings-extension

Note: rating may not be visible for some titles. 

Disclaimer: Disney+ is a trademark of Disney Media and Entertainment Distribution. This extension hold no association or affiliation with Disney+ or any third-party companies.
